task.title: Delete Query from History
task.shortdesc: Delete a query from the Query History.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on the query you wish to delete and select Delete from the context menu. Alternately, select the query you wish to delete and press Delete/Backspace.
step.stepresult: A dialog will appear asking you to confirm that you would like to delete the query.

step.cmd: If you are unsure, click Cancel. To continue and delete the query, click Ok.
step.stepresult: The query will no longer appear in the Query History window.
